name: Truth Or Dare!
description:
Truth Or Dare! is a fun project developed by college students who attend Access Creative College in order to develop their skills to tackle much larger projects!

The students each created a version of the game themselves. This particular app was created by Harvey Wray (Programmer) and Jay Jones (Artist).

CREDITS

Project Manager: Isaac Brooks / Guy Bramwell-Smith

Programmers: Harvey Wray, Adam  Faraj, Cherry Brown, Cody Hayward, Freddie Flanagan-Sita, James Rowbottom, Karl Gudegast, Leighton Anderson, Maisy Miller, Oli Macintosh, Rosanna Faulkner, Seamus Winter, Sophie Slater

Artist: Jay Jones, Jordan Robinson, Noah Smith
